summary.para: Draws a metafile to the command sink using the given source and destination rectangles.

param.name: destinationRectangle
param.para: The rectangle in the target where the metafile will be drawn, relative to the upper left corner (defined in DIPs). If NULL is specified, the destination rectangle is the size of the target.

param.name: sourceRectangle
param.para: The rectangle of the source metafile that will be drawn, relative to the upper left corner (defined in DIPs). If NULL is specified, the source rectangle is the value returned by .

returns.para: This method does not return a value.

summary.para: Renders a given gradient mesh to the target.

param.name: gradientMesh
param.para: The gradient mesh to be rendered.

returns.para: This method does not return a value.

summary.para: Renders the given ink object using the given brush and ink style.

param.name: ink
param.para: The ink object to be rendered.

param.name: brush
param.para: The brush with which to render the ink object.

param.name: inkStyle
param.para: The ink style to use when rendering the ink object.

returns.para: This method does not return a value.

summary.para: This interface performs all the same functions as the existing interface. It also enables access to ink rendering and gradient mesh rendering.
